title: Bug on the new client
body: Patch after patch I give the new client a try but the problem is still there. My fps are too low to play, I have to close the game open it again with the legacy client in order to play. I play the game on low settings, I use the beta client withouth effects but it doesn't fix anything and I haven't seen any improvement with new pattches release, so does this mean you guys arent working on this issue? Does this mean once you make this new client the only client avaiable I'll say good bye to this game? Am I really the only one with this issue?

replies.body:
Weird! The only time I've ever seen the *Beta Client* affect FPS has been on lower-end PCs that have a limited amount of processing power and memory available. If this sounds like the type of setup you're playing League on, you may want to [**perform a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to reduce the amount of applications running in the background.

Let me know if you see any improvement in your framerate after taking those steps!
